channel.title: Context Engineering Daily - Prompt Engineering
channel.description: Latest Prompt Engineering news in Context Engineering

item.title: Measuring Stability Beyond Accuracy in Small Open-Source Medical Large Language Models for Pediatric Endocrinology
item.description: arXiv:2601.11567v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Small open-source medical large language models (LLMs) offer promising opportunities for low-resource deployment and broader accessibility. However, their evaluation is often limited to accuracy on medical multiple choice question (MCQ) benchmarks, an...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> GPT, model, prompt, framework, arxiv | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Concept Attractors in LLMs and their Applications
item.description: arXiv:2601.11575v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language models (LLMs) often map semantically related prompts to similar internal representations at specific layers, even when their surface forms differ widely. We show that this behavior can be explained through Iterated Function Systems (IFS...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> model, prompt, arxiv, RAG, fine-tuning | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Context-Engineering - "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.
item.description: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy.
